entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING, Cartwright
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:25 p.m. ADT Sunday 2 April 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -1.3Â°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Cartwright Airport 11:03 PM ADT Sunday 2 April 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -1.3°C
Pressure: 99.0 kPa
Visibility: 1.2 km
Humidity: 96 %
Wind Chill: -9
Dewpoint: -1.9°C
Wind: NE 35 km/h gust 58 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: n/a

entry.title: Sunday night: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. Amount 20 cm. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming northeast 50 gusting to 70 this evening then northwest 30 gusting to 50 except gusting to 70 along parts of the coast before morning. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NDT Sunday 2 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: Periods of snow and blowing snow. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Periods of snow and blowing snow. Blowing snow over exposed areas late in the afternoon. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 except gusting to 80 along parts of the coast. High minus 1. Wind chill near minus 11. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NDT Sunday 2 April 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 10. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries in the evening. Clearing near midnight. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming west 30 gusting to 50 in the evening. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 11 in the evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NDT Sunday 2 April 2023

entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. High minus 1. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NDT Sunday 2 April 2023
